nodes.text: Pedisic was a female specialist in the Sith military during the Cold War. Around the year 3643 BBY, Pedisic and Sith Acolyte Eldon Ax were called to the Paramount in order to extract information from the memory of a hex droid. It was hoped that the information would lead the Sith to a resource-rich planet. She told Eldon about the coordinates, which led to the planet Sebaddon. However Pedisic thought the coordinates of location must be wrong because it led to black hole.
